TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FontNamesConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 在包含字体名称列表的字符串和表示个别名称的字符串数组之间进行转换。

span.span: Converts between a string containing a list of font names and an array of strings representing the individual names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的此类包含一系列为包含各个名称的字符串数组的字体名称的单个字符串之间相互转换的方法。Use the method of this class to convert a single string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 必须由逗号分隔字符串中的每个字体名称。Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma. 例如，字符串"arial，次新 roman，verdana"，将转换为数组，其中包含字符串"arial"、"时间 new roman"和"verdana"。For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana". 请注意，用逗号将删除的开头或末尾的字体名称的任何空白。Notice the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name. 不删除空格的字体名称的中间。White space in the middle of a font name is not removed. 方法执行反向操作。The method performs the reverse operation. 它将转换包含个别字体名称为包含一系列名称的单个字符串的字符串数组。It converts an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names. 例如，将一个数组，包含字符串"arial"、"时间 new roman"和"verdana"转换为字符串"arial，次新 roman，verdana"。For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana". 请注意之间没有任何空白的字体名称自动插入逗号。Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space. 调用方法以验证是否可以在调用之前进行转换方法。Call the method to verify that the conversion can be made before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将具有一系列字体名称的字符串转换为包含各个名称的字符串数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 然后重新转换为单个字符串，显示的字符串数组。The array of strings is then converted back to a single string and displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

Type Converter Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in .

summary.span: 确定此转换器是否可以将指定数据类型的对象转换为包含个别字体名称的字符串数组。

span.span: Determines whether this converter can convert an object of the specified data type to an array of strings containing individual font names.

returns.span: 如果可以转换类型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the type can be converted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以确定指定的数据类型是否可以转换为包含个别字体名称的字符串数组。Use the method to determine whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings containing individual font names. > [!NOTE] > 此转换器可以转换只能从`string`数据类型。This converter can convert only from a `string` data type. `sourceType`参数必须为类型。The `sourceType` parameter must be of type . 否则，此方法返回`false`以指示不能转换指定的数据类型。Otherwise, this method returns `false` to indicate that the specified data type cannot be converted. 您可以选择传入`null`为`context`参数。You can optionally pass in `null` for the `context` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 该示例确定指定的数据类型是否可以转换为包含个别字体名称，然后再执行转换的字符串数组。The example determines whether the specified data type can be converted to an array of strings that contains the individual font names before performing the conversion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法来转换包含一系列为包含各个名称的字符串数组的字体名称的字符串。Use the method to convert a string containing a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. 必须由逗号分隔字符串中的每个字体名称。Each font name in the string must be separated by a comma. 例如，字符串"arial，次新 roman，verdana"，将转换为数组，其中包含字符串"arial"、"时间 new roman"和"verdana"。For example, the string "arial, times new roman, verdana", converts to an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana". 请注意，用逗号将删除的开头或末尾的字体名称的任何空白。Notice that the commas are removed along with any white space at the beginning or end of the font name. 不删除空格的字体名称的中间。White space in the middle of a font name is not removed. > [!NOTE] > `context`和`culture`参数不能在此版本的方法; 它们是保留供将来版本的方法。The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method. 您可以选择传入`null`为这些参数。You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以将具有一系列字体名称的字符串转换为包含各个名称的字符串数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to convert a string with a list of font names to an array of strings containing the individual names. summary.span: 从包含个别字体名称的字符串数组创建表示字体名称列表的字符串。

span.span: Creates a string that represents a list of font names from an array of strings containing individual font names.

returns.span: 表示包含字体名称列表的字符串的 实例。

span.span: A instance that represents a string containing a list of font names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将包含到单个字符串的名称的列表包含个别字体名称的字符串数组。Use the method to convert an array of strings containing the individual font names to a single string containing a list of the names. 例如，将一个数组，包含字符串"arial"、"时间 new roman"和"verdana"转换为字符串"arial，次新 roman，verdana"。For example, an array that contains the strings "arial", "times new roman", and "verdana" converts to the string "arial,times new roman,verdana". 请注意之间没有任何空白的字体名称自动插入逗号。Notice that commas are automatically inserted between the font names without any white space. > [!NOTE] > 此转换器只能转换为`string`数据类型。This converter can convert only to a `string` data type. `destinationType`参数必须为类型。The `destinationType` parameter must be of type . > [!NOTE] > `context`和`culture`参数不能在此版本的方法; 它们是保留供将来版本的方法。The `context` and `culture` parameters are not used in this version of the method; they are reserved for future versions of the method. 您可以选择传入`null`为这些参数。You can optionally pass in `null` for these parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将包含到包含字体名称的列表的单个字符串的各个名称的字符串数组。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to convert an array of strings containing the individual names to a single string that contains a list of font names. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic FontNamesConverter.CanConvertFrom Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
